blogPost.excerpt: The first reliable all-in-one investing, trading, and saving application. A platform for analyzing and executing on quality information, and then sharing thoughts, research, and profits to any social media platform with a button tap. BETA: http://www.tradearies.com/?kid=1F6DV1
blogPost.body: The first reliable all-in-one investing, trading, and saving application. A platform for analyzing and executing on quality information, and then sharing thoughts, research, and profits to any social media platform with a button tap. BETA: http://www.tradearies.com/?kid=1F6DV1
blogPost.title: Aries - Bridging the stock market gap between retail and wall-street
blogPost.author: Reda

localize.description: 第一款可靠的集投资、交易、储蓄于一体的应用。一个对优质信息进行分析和执行的平台，然后通过点击按钮将想法、研究和利润分享到任何社交媒体平台。BETA：http://www.tradearies.com/?kid=1F6DV1
localize.tagline: 缩小散户与墙头草之间的股市差距

localize.description: 第一款可靠的集投資、交易、儲蓄於一體的應用。一個對優質信息進行分析和執行的平臺，然後通過點擊按鈕將想法、研究和利潤分享到任何社交媒體平臺。BETA：http://www.tradearies.com/?kid=1F6DV1
localize.tagline: 縮小散戶與牆頭草之間的股市差距

previous.excerpt: They are perfect to be used in email to redirect iOS users to the app store, android users to the play store and for those that uses a computer, you can redirect them to your web app. And those users we can not match, they will be sent do your default url.
previous.title: Kameleont - Create dynamic links that redirects based on device or OS

localize.description: 他们是完美的被用于在电子邮件中重定向iOS用户到应用商店，安卓用户到Play商店和那些使用电脑，你可以重定向他们到你的Web应用程序。而那些我们无法匹配的用户，他们将被发送到做你的默认网址。
localize.tagline: 创建动态链接，根据设备或操作系统重定向。

localize.description: 他們是完美的被用於在電子郵件中重定向iOS用戶到應用商店，安卓用戶到Play商店和那些使用電腦，你可以重定向他們到你的Web應用程序。而那些我們無法匹配的用戶，他們將被髮送到做你的默認網址。
localize.tagline: 創建動態鏈接，根據設備或操作系統重定向。
